name: Hocmai.vn
tagline: Hold the key to bringing quality education to millions of students
description:
HOCMAI Education Inc. owns and operates an largest online learning platform in Vietnam that provides all adaptive testing system, online K-12 courses, and tutoring services . Its products include online university entrance test prep courses and Vietnamese-common-core-based online courses from K1 to K12.

The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Hanoi, Vietnam.
